thread.title: Warm, Cozy, Convenient
thread.title_full: Warm, Cozy, Convenient - Review of Citadines Place d'Italie Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mitzerz
title: Warm, Cozy, Convenient
text:
I think this place is one of the things my kids remember well when I ask them about Paris. They loved Citadines. It was really clean; the beds were nice. We had 2 rooms. It has a full kitchen. And it had a view of the Eiffel Tower. The best thing was that the mall was right behind it. We can shop for clothes, food, etc. To its left, more restaurants and the Metro (subway), to its right, a McDonald's. Definitely a great place for a family!
Room Tip: upper rooms get view of Eiffel Tower See more room tips
